languages.text: {n}Абеляр склоняет голову и смотрит на вас с плохо скрываемым беспокойством.{/n} "Разумеется, Лорд-капитан".
{n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр склоняет голову и смотрит на вас с плохо скрываемым беспокойством.{/n} "Разумеется, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德低下头，带着无法掩饰的失望看着你。{/n}“没问题，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德低下头，带着无法掩饰的失望看着你。{/n}“没问题，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Abelard te hace una reverencia y te mira con una consternación que no logra ocultar.{/n} «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te hace una reverencia y te mira con una consternación que no logra ocultar.{/n} «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは頭を下げ、狼狽を隠しきれない様子であなたを見つめる。{/n}「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは頭を下げ、狼狽を隠しきれない様子であなたを見つめる。{/n}「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard neigt den Kopf und blickt dich mit unverhohlener Bestürzung an.{/n} "Natürlich, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard neigt den Kopf und blickt dich mit unverhohlener Bestürzung an.{/n} "Natürlich, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard baisse la tête et vous regarde avec une consternation à peine dissimulée.{/n} « Bien entendu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Abelard başını eğip saklayamadığı bir hayal kırıklığıyla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard bows his head and looks at you with ill-concealed dismay.{/n} "Of course, Lord Captain."
